message.body: What r they getting this round?:)
Okey dokey, great thanks. Ill have Seybolt come out for lucky n titan:)
Hey, thanks for scheduling seybolt! I don't want lucky to get the strangles vax, FYI.
Ok!;) do u know something I don't about the strangles vaccine?
It has about 60% efficacy and side effects are really common - I don't think it's worth the side effects unless the pony is showing all the time :)
Ok, maybe ill skip too... I don't agree with over vaccinating!
Yup! I don't mind doing stuff like west Nile that's unlikely but doesn't have a lot of side effects, but low efficacy + a possibly uncomfortable pony = why bother, I think!
Hey, did you get your coggins back yet?
